title: Update Customer Contact Information
description: A customer has moved and needs to update their mailing address and phone number on file.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity before making account changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Collect the new address and phone number from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the new contact information.

tasks.description: Update the customer's profile in the central CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the customer record.
